en: A tunneling engineer who creates passageways through stone.
Increases your speed when moving outside of tunnels.

Increases the max length of your tunnels.

Hold the dig button to increase tunnel length before releasing the tunneler.
Increases the max length of your tunnels.
Increases the max length of your tunnels.
Increases the max length of your tunnels.
Makes the tunneler dig faster and increases damage caused by you when travelling in tunnels.
Makes the tunneler dig faster and increases damage caused by you when travelling in tunnels.
Makes the tunneler dig faster and increases damage caused by you when travelling in tunnels.
While a tunneler is digging you can fire another tunneler to continue from where it finishes.
The queued tunnelers will split and shoot off to the sides of the first tunnel.

Queue even more tunnelers after the initial split.

They will be half the length of the first split.
While digging a tunnel through resources they are spit out of the tunnel.

Tunnels will hoover up resources close to them.

Press and hold the drop button before touching a tunnel to add a vacuum.

You do less damage to tunnels you use infrequently.

Quickly going back and forth through the same tunnel will build up friction, which allows you to negate the damage reduction and destroy tiles as normal.
You move even faster when travelling in tunnels.
You move much faster when travelling in tunnels.

Detonate finished tunnels using the same button you drop resources with.

Will probably be removed since it's super OP...
Score upload disabled due to playing modded
